dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: The IMDB Movie Review dataset contains 50000 movie reviews, half of them being in the training set and the other half in the test set. The dataset is utilized for sentiment analysis, with preprocessing that includes keeping 5000 words and truncating or padding each sequence to a fixed length of 200.
dcterms:title: IMDB Movie Review dataset

dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. In this work, it is filtered to focus on specific pairs of digits for binary classification problems.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset
